title: The Price for a Princess
overview: After the death of Princess' mother, her father Malik looks after her alone. Unable to support Princess by himself, Malik resorts to drastic measures.

title: DAY 7
overview: After a police officer is murdered at home, Detective Rocha, who was no longer on active duty, is called in to solve the case. Rocha discovers that the officer's death is just a small point close to the great mystery that surrounds this death.
tagline: ON DAY 7 YOU DISCOVER MUCH MORE THAN A DEATH

title: Heavy Shadow
overview: The story of Ola Kravchenko who has been accused by her ex-boyfriend and by a documentary show to have been the murderer of Tair Rada but acquitted by Israel's state attorney office.

title: Decisions
overview: When an indecisive hitman comes face to face with the man he has to kill, he must do the thing he fears the most, make a decision.
tagline: JUST GOTTA LOOK HIM IN THE EYES AND KILL HIM

title: Somewhere To Be
overview: An impulsive underground fighter refuses to throw his last fight of the night for extra cash. Will he make it to his fiancée in time?

title: The Great Speakeasy
overview: A historian tells the story of Ian and Mindy. Two teenagers who go to a speakeasy
tagline: Gulp Gulp Gulp

title: BUDDY COP: Pilot
overview: Buddy Cop is mostly a non-narrative series about two slackers who are detectives, Detective Hennessy (Ariobimo) and Detective François (Keanu Acyuta), living their lives like a comedy. Be a witness to the pilot of our series.
tagline: YOU WANNA GO GET IT? LAUGHS*

title: Norman
overview: Detective Norman Brook reunites with an old friend to investigate a series of eerie murders.
tagline: JOE BROOK is NORMAN.

title: A Beach in New England
overview: FRIDAY, AUGUST 29th, 2017: three local teenagers stumble on the aftermath of a grisly crime. MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 1st, 2017: two people are dead, a boy is in intensive care, and the most notorious narcotics dealer in the South Shore is in custody. 6 YEARS LATER: a novelist, a retired FBI detective, a public-access documentary program, and a survivor try to make sense of it.  A director's cut/remix of SEE YOU NEXT WEEKEND.
tagline: "We buried Bloom Beesly today. We buried Bloom Beesly six years ago."

title: UnBlock
overview: It’s not even 2 days since they met on Facebook. Karan comes with his friend Shakeel from Mumbai. In early morning, Rinki opens the door of hir hotel room. Shalu is standing in front, When Shalu is unable to say anything, Rinki goes to Shakeel’s room and found him dead.

title: Voyage Into the Night
overview: The Interconnected stories of a writer, a thief and two hit men trying to solve a murder.

production_companies.name: 3iS - Institut International de l'Image et du Son

title: Sweeney Todd - O Barbeiro Demônio de Fleet Street
Murder On A Sunday Morning
overview: A Detective is called in to solve the complicated murder of Madame L'Pouffe
tagline: IN THIS HOUSE, ON THIS DAY, A MURDER WAS COMMITTED SO TERRIBLE THAT THE WORLDS GREATEST DETECTIVE HAD TO BE CALLED IN

title: Fortune Favors the Guilty
overview: When a gang suffers a clash in differing ideologies, a tense race for prosperity ensues with lines drawn and guns fired.
tagline: An apple a day...

title: Dope Runner
overview: A young dealer ventures out to save his fellow customer from the hands of a vengeful loan shark.
tagline: Run Dopeboy Run!

title: On Point
overview: Natalie and her roommate Amy head to a party downtown. While waiting for a cab, Amy stops to buy a vape when she's confronted by an armed man with an agenda.

title: Jagal Rahayu
overview: Five teenagers decided to celebrate New Year's Eve at a cottage in a village that turns out to have a very terrifying New Year's ritual.
tagline: DARAH DIBALAS DARAH, MATI DIBALAS MATI

title: Just Us
overview: In Kieran Perasud's short gangster/crime film, A young gangster, Bryce, is assigned with a hit job. He anxiously awaits the designated target only to screw up the mission and let the target escape. After the job he must meet up with his crew, Alex and Charlie, and face the consequences of his failure.
tagline: A young gangster, Bryce, is assigned with a hit job. He anxiously awaits the designated target only to screw up the mission and let the target escape. After the job he must meet up with his crew, Alex and Charlie, and face the consequences of his failure.

title: La hora roja
overview: They only have one hour left before a group of terrorists undertake the last part of their mission: carrying and detonating a bomb in the Center of Lima, the Congress and the Government Palace. Behind them, an undercover police officer must decide whether to act or obey a direct order from the highest command of the Peruvian government. Shot in a single sequence shot.

title: Home for Sale
overview: Loan sharks harass Damir and his family, even to the point of writing “home for sale” on the exterior of their house. Damir desperately tries to borrow money from his relatives, friends, and anyone else he knows; Cholpon also struggles to prevent the worst from happening.

title: Bato Bato Sa Langit, Ang Maigo Lihay
overview: Police investigators respond to a murder, this time – at a rural village in their city. Their supreme investigation skills are now put to test.

title: ATASCAU
overview: Four puppets that can't leave their house because of quarantine, decide to make a short film, but they have no idea what to make it about.

title: TAILS (The Flip of a coin Finale)
overview: As tensions come to a violent standoff, blood is shed and history is made in the Flip of a coin Finale.

title: The Monster Case (Primary Project)
overview: Two young girls join two young men to experience a new adventure, unaware that they are going to be part of a monster's case.
tagline: short film

title: Arjun
overview: When two different men from different walks of life are approached to sell drugs, one agrees while the other disagrees. What happens next forms the rest of the story.
tagline: What He Thought To Be An Easy Task Became A Misery

title: Blinded Shot
overview: Memphis slacker Courtney clashes with his tough-love parents who want him to grow up. Secretly, Courtney leads a notorious robbery crew targeting the city's elite. One mistake sparks chaos, forcing Courtney to confront his successful lawyer brother Jarvis, their strained relationship, and a dark family secret that brings deadly consequences.
tagline: One wrong decision and EVERYONE goes down!

title: Suffolk Strangler: 30 Days of Terror
overview: Our crime documentary delves into the case of the Suffolk Strangler, who terrorized Ipswich, Suffolk by targeting sex workers and brutally murdering five women between October and December 2006. We take an extensive look into how police finally captured the killer by exploring the details of the case from start to finish. We believe this documentary will provide new insight into this notorious criminal case.

title: The Chase
overview: A serial killer chases a long time target of his...
tagline: Let The Hunt Begin!

title: Fettyland
overview: Named after an area of Southwest Florida notorious for opioid use and starring actual residents, Fettyland is a verité tale of four flophouse roommates hustling and chasing down any scam they can to stay off the streets for just one more day.

title: Fakebook
overview: In a world where even his brothers in arms are against him, 38-years-old Police officer Rawad Fakhoury executes a mission impossible to provide a kidney for his dying daughter. The clock is ticking while there's no one to trust but himself.

title: Экстрасенс
overview: 1997. Bandits come to psychics to get in touch with their murdered sidekick - the only one who knew where the common fund was hidden.

title: Lycanthropy
overview: Detectives Kessler and Mills investigate the case of a missing girl. Kessler realises that he won't solve this case with conventional methods and decides to take the law into his own hands.

title: Lolly
overview: Rene, a loving-lollipop crime scene cleaner, who works for criminals, leads himself into a complex situation when he violates the criminal’s order.

title: Dead Body
overview: Two lifelong friends must come together to dispose of a dead body. Criminal hi-jinks ensue.
tagline: WE GOT THIS

title: TakenOff
overview: Marcos lives comfortably in his big house far from old customs. One night he receives a death threat which awakens a powerful paranoia in him.
tagline: Be careful with your past.

title: The Black Saint and The Sinner Lady
overview: A hitman is seduced by a dancer that he had been tasked to kill.

title: Money Lovers
overview: A hacker-turned-detective is forced to choose between money and love when he falls in love with the sexy crypto-crime thief he's trying to bring down.

title: The Museum
overview: A short film directed by Marlon Lara

title: Serenity is Key
overview: A criminal psycholgoist is faced with understanding her toughest case yet.

title: The Greatest Truth 2
overview: At the end of Part 1, just as the truth seemed clear, new questions arose: Who masterminded the plan? Who committed the murders? And most importantly—where is Maxim and Anna's father?

title: Another Day, Another Dollar
overview: A down and out mime is struggling to make money as a street performer. He turns to a life of crime with the help of other performers.

title: Susie Searches
overview: An awkward, braces-wearing sleuth investigates a disappearance. Basis for the feature film.

title: Street Hero
overview: Stefan is a 40-year-old loser, although, thanks to his carefully built facade, he seems like an attractive city slicker. He lost his job, but also his wife, who threw him out of the apartment, and he was left without a lover. Now he works as a private detective, but also illegally.

title: Sclerosis
overview: The cast and crew of a movie set review their time working with each other
tagline: "The Perfect Short Film" - Paul Rudd

title: Ducky
overview: An 18 year old deadbeat throws himself head first into a life of crime, but an unexpected reunion may ruin everything.

title: Somos invisibles
overview: The story of a mother condemned to life in prison for murdering her husband, who is granted one last afternoon at her home with her children where each recounts dark stories from their shared past.

title: Bijeh
overview: A documentary about the most famous serial killer in the early 2000s in Iran, "Bijeh" was a serial killer who mainly targeted children.

title: The Expected Guest
overview: A short crime film.

title: Apartman 202
overview: A girl who fancies herself a detective solves a cold case while listening to a podcast.

title: Love's First Bullet
overview: In this film noir when cunning Mia Farrow is charged with murdering her lover, she calls the savvy lawyer Liam Scott, proclaiming her innocence. Then she spins a web to draw him in to her tale.
tagline: Premeditated love can kill you

title: Revenge
overview: She skillfully manipulates men's emotions and convinces them that she is genuinely interested in building a relationship with them.
tagline: A young woman's life changed dramatically after she was sexually assaulted, raped, and infected with HIV. She devises a plan to infect as many men as possible. As a means of advancing her twisted agenda, she uses her beauty and charm.

title: Seeing Red
overview: A recently unemployed con artist takes on a job as a carer for a blind woman, unaware of who she really is.
tagline: There are no shortcuts.

title: Melody
overview: This is a film which takes a man into some dark memories. Or are they even dark? When he hears a haunting melody, the guy turns out to be a psychopath murderer who kills people with a cutter.
tagline: Was it all a dream? A Fantasy? Was it real?

title: The How To Series Movie - The Final Insult
overview: A budding Television host hires a murderous Assistant who is only interested in taking the Host's life
tagline: A movie that exists.

title: SPIKE
overview: "SPIKE" tells the story of a down and dirty private eye who seems to have bitten off more than he can chew!
tagline: It's Gonna Be A Crazy Day!

title: Sweet Temptation
overview: A no-named lad turns 18, and he goes on an adventure. Along the way, the lad stumbles upon some dangerous figures.

title: Glass Stairs
overview: A femme fatale discovers a goon from her past has arrived uninvited. A game of cat and mouse occurs where neither is sure who is the cat and who is the mouse, but both like to play with their prey.

title: O Tumblr Tem Suas Regras: O Filme
Bifurcate
overview: Scruggs a disgruntled ex police officer goes to meet his old foe Dysentery, as she claims to have some information he needs.
tagline: The Path Splits

title: Goofyfellas
overview: A thrilling story of action, comedy and thrill, that charts the rise and fall of famed gangaster Alasdair Unger
tagline: Mothertrucker!

title: The Rashomon Protocol
overview: Two officers interrogate suspects of a murder that was committed by either of them in a party the previous night, as they speak about their perspectives, the officers fall into a spiral deeper than they had expected this to be.
tagline: Every truth starts with a lie.

title: Motif 2: Jenayah Ilmu Hitam
overview: Episode 8. The Mona Fendi case in the 90's. Tonight at 9pm on Astro PRIMA HD.

title: The Great Cane Robbery
overview: On the run after a bank robbery, a group of mobster pandas question their own partners in crime as greed and resentment settle in.

title: 3 friends and 1 secret
overview: Three friends die mysteriously leaving the detective to investigate a possible murder.

title: A Bonking Most Foul
overview: When the heir to a billion dollar fortune is bonked and his last will and testament stolen, two local detectives must crack the case. But things aren't quite as they seem...
tagline: Who Bonked Bert?

title: The Body Under the Patio: Murder in Suburbia
overview: Unraveling the chilling case of William and Patricia Wycherley, an unassuming couple who vanished from their Mansfield home in 1998, leaving their neighbours oblivious to the sinister truth lurking beneath the surface.

title: The Final Chapter of Madness
overview: The minds of two master manipulators collide when journalist Courtney Piggott is granted authority to interview serial killer Compton Graves, in his search for the truth behind the 'question marks' over further victims.

title: The Deal
overview: 2 men discuss a deal over the phone

title: Cat Burglars
overview: Two catnip drug peddlers scam a pimp and now they must escape his thugs.
tagline: They aren't kitten around.

title: Death Protocol
overview: A reporter investigating police corruption faces danger at every twist and turn. As he races to expose the explosive truth, he must decide where to place his trust.
tagline: Corruption is a disease. Meet the cure

title: Rain is a City
overview: Ash, a hardened drug debt enforcer, seeks redemption by saving a vulnerable family from a violent criminal.
tagline: "You were right... I love hurting people"

title: The HARD Life and Times of Clownie Vol.1
overview: A satire on the American entertainment industry, the story follows the real life exploits of Clownie as life drags him through the mud. Echoing from the likes of Italian Neo-realist, Roberto Rossellini and early Fellini, the movie is raw and shows the harsh reality of Florida life.
tagline: The Worlds ONLY Bonafide Hype Clown

title: Lumberjack: The Son Says Hello
overview: A well-mannered assassin strikes up a relationship with the ex-wife of the manic detective who's tracking him down.

title: Mise à mort en été (Ou l'entre-film)
overview: Mise à mort en été (Ou l'entre-film) is what remains of a medium-length film shot in June 2023 under a heatwave, in a town on the outskirts of Nice similar to these images on the outskirts of a ghost story. Presences wander within them, without however appearing to belong to them.

title: NIGHTLIFE
overview: Vincent navigates a dark city, on his way to make one last delivery. A short crime thriller made by two film students.
tagline: One night can change your life.

title: Stopping By The Country
overview: Looking for a place to spend the night, a young man stops by a countryside inn with no body around. As he looks through the building for assistance, he walks upon a gruesome scene.

title: The Puppeteer
overview: A hard-boiled detective with a vendetta interrogates a notorious gangster.
tagline: Who's pulling the strings?

title: The Kris Kringle Files
overview: Two Soy Boys hunt down Santa Claus.
tagline: SANTA ISN'T REAL!

title: Looking Too Hard
overview: A re-telling of a romantic date isn't the fairy tale its made up to be

title: Sleigher 3
overview: The Sleigher universe comes to a close in the final installment of the trilogy.
tagline: Never be on the nice list again

title: AV-1
overview: Miles Flynn is writing a story about the death of Thomas Mosley, a journalist who was killed while investigating a series of muggings at a local train station in 1979. Miles soon realizes that the two writers have much more in common than he initially thought.
tagline: Our memory can give us the clearest picture

title: Tailings
tagline: In this city there is no law for all

title: Matt Cop: Confrontation
overview: On his case to cut down gang activities in his city, Matthew Fletcher teams up with an unlikely ally, Ace, a rival gangster who seeks to take out the dominating Chapman family run by Al Alderman and Matt's very own brother, Daniel Fletcher, as the pair for goes confronting the rival family, but not without dire consequences.
tagline: Nothing left to lose- except dignity

title: Caroline's Secret
overview: A budding filmmaker looks into a cold missing persons case, discovering the involvement of someone close to home.

title: Oongi Adicha Ondra Ton Weightu Da
overview: The nimalan who is arrested by police for serial killing, he disagrees that he never committed any crime. The story unfolds the crimes happened in the city, who is the real killer? Why he does?

title: Dirty Work
overview: Two criminals plot to kidnap someone on the orders of an unseen crime boss.
tagline: A simple in and out job

title: El Encuentro
overview: A kidnapper captures a new victim.
